ARTICLE.TITLE: 1 dead after shooting in Russell neighborhood
ARTICLE.TEXT:
1 dead after shooting in Russell neighborhood

Metro Police are investigating an overnight homicide in the Russell neighborhood.It happened just before midnight at 26th Street and West Muhammad Ali Boulevard. Police said they responded to a ShotSpotter alert.When they arrived, they found a man believed to be in his late 30s dead from at least one gunshot wound. The victim's name has not been released and no suspects have been identified.Anyone with information is asked to call police.

The victim's name has not been released and no suspects have been identified.

Anyone with information is asked to call police.
